statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT username, email FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards_points > 100;
SELECT user_id, username FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email, rewards_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards_points < 50 ORDER BY rewards_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards_points > 100 ORDER BY rewards_points DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM loyalty_program WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, rewards_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, rewards_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards_points >= 200 ORDER BY rewards_points DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT l.user_id, r.reward_id, r.reward_points FROM loyalty_program_data l JOIN rewards_points r ON l.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points ORDER BY reward_points DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT member_id, member_name, email FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE availability = true;
SELECT transaction_id, member_id, reward_id, amount, transaction_date FROM ledger ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, email, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT member_name, email FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required <= 500;
SELECT l.transaction_id, lp.member_name, r.reward_name, l.amount FROM ledger l JOIN loyalty_program lp ON l.member_id = lp.member_id JOIN rewards r ON l.reward_id = r.reward_id WHERE l.amount > 50;
SELECT lp.member_name, SUM(l.amount) AS total_spent FROM ledger l JOIN loyalty_program lp ON l.member_id = lp.member_id GROUP BY lp.member_name HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards_catalog WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT * FROM ledger_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY points_affected DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_url FROM e_commerce_integration WHERE integration_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT e.platform_name, r.reward_name, l.points_affected FROM e_commerce_integration e JOIN ledger_transactions l ON e.platform_id = l.customer_id JOIN rewards_catalog r ON l.reward_id = r.reward_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 1;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, c.customer_name, r.reward_name FROM ledger_transactions t JOIN loyalty_program_data c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN rewards_catalog r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC, c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM rewards ORDER BY point_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM ledger WHERE points_transacted < 0;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM customer_accounts WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY customer_id ASC;

SELECT c.customer_id, r.reward_name, l.points_transacted FROM customer_accounts c JOIN rewards r ON c.total_points >= r.point_cost JOIN ledger l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id WHERE r.point_cost <= 500;

SELECT l.transaction_id, c.customer_id, e.platform_name, l.points_transacted FROM ledger l JOIN customer_accounts c ON l.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN e_commerce_platforms e ON c.platform_id = e.platform_id WHERE l.points_transacted < 0;
SELECT account_id, customer_id, platform_id, total_points FROM customer_accounts WHERE total_points BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
